root.name: Devil Kings
root.description: Characters For its English release, the characters had their names changed but their identities remained fairly obvious with virtually no changes in what cutscenes, events, or sparse dialog remained in the game. Only the first 10 are playable:Oda Nobunaga - Devil KingNou-hime - Lady ButterflyMori Ranmaru - HornetTakeda Shingen - Red MinotaurSanada Yukimura - ScorpioDate Masamune - Azure DragonUesugi Kenshin - FrostItsuki - Puff Zabil - Q-ball Honda Tadakatsu - Iron OxSarutobi Sasuke - TalonKasuga - VenusMaeda Matsu - Bramble Maeda Toshiie - Lark Akechi Mitsuhide - Reaper Chosokabe Motochika - Arslan Mori Motonari - Kahz Tokugawa Ieyasu - Irdene Shimazu Yoshihiro - Zaan Imagawa Yoshimoto - Muri Hojo Ujimasa - Orwik Setting and Gameplay Taking place in Japan, the maps closely resemble Samurai Warriors (if with simpler, less expansive areas). Both allied and enemy forces, from conscripts to officers are generally more aggressive than the tendency of Musou games, but otherwise gameplay closely mirrors early Musou games.
